creator: PKO Bank Polski SA
descriptionHtml:
Download the latest version of the free IKO application (electronic banking service) and use your bank account at PKO Bank Polski or Inteligo. The IKO app on your phone means fast and secure finances any day.

Activate the IKO app and take avail of the available functionalities:

BANK ACCOUNTS:
- account balance, history and details of all bank accounts,
- transfer to any domestic account number via Elixir or as an instant transfer,
- transfer based on data scanned from an invoice or from a QR code in an invoice,
- bank transfer by phone,
- bank transfer to Tax Office,
- foreign transfer,
- standing orders and a series of transfers,
- cash withdrawals from ATMs using the BLIK code,
- cash deposits (at selected ATMs) to your own or another IKO user’s bank account using the BLIK code,
- pre-paid phone top-ups,
- send a transfer request to another user,
- “piggy banks” to set money aside for any purpose,
- generate transfer confirmations,
- preview of unexecuted transactions (pending and canceled/rejected),
- applying for: a bank account (personal, savings and foreign currency*), an account overdraft*.

CARDS:
- history, details and images of your debit and credit cards,
- card management: activation, PIN assignment, change limits, temporary card freeze, restricting the card (with the option of getting a new one*), a change of card image,
- multi-currency card service*,
- transfer from a credit card,
- repay utilized credit card limit,
- credit card as a payments source for BLIK online & in-store payments.

LOANS:
- schedule and details of borrowings,
- apply for a loan*.

TERM DEPOSITS:
- details of term deposits,
- open and terminate term deposits.

INSURANCE:
- purchase travel and vehicle insurance*.

PAYMENTS:
- contactless payments by phone with NFC**,
- in store payments using the BLIK code/check,
- online payments with the BLIK code/check, also without copying the code in trusted online stores and browsers (Shopping without the BLIK code),
- create and share BLIK checks.

ADDITIONAL FUNCTIONALITIES:
- mobile authorization,
- public transport tickets,
- parking fee,
- "Join our cause": standing orders for charitable purposes,
- push notifications,
- currency exchange*,
- 4 languages: Polish, English, Russian, Ukrainian,
- IKO personalization: change the main screen view and product names (accounts, deposits, loans),
- save and restore personalized application settings after re-installing IKO,
- option to simultaneously activate IKO and iPKO using the first login password,
- fingerprint login (Android 6.0 and a fingerprint reader required),
- shortcut button to favorite functions on the home screen,
- receive Western Union transfers,
- create and share QR codes with transfer details,
- currency exchange rates,
- map of PKO Bank Polski branches, ATMs and stores supporting BLIK payments.

For more on IKO go to iko.pkobp.pl/iko_en
For more on IKO activation go to iko.pkobp.pl/iko_en/activation

* Not available for Inteligo customers.
** Contactless payments are available for phones with NFC and minimum Android 4.4 to individual customers with a PKO Bank Polski, including Inteligo, debit or credit card. Contactless payments are not available on the so-called “rooted" devices, i.e. those on which manufacturer's security has been removed.

descriptionShort: Activate the IKO app and manage your personal finances on your phone

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
VOICE ASSISTANT
Service the IKO app with your voice. Make an ordinary transfer or a transfer to a telephone number, check the balance of your account, search the history and top-up your telephone. At the present moment, the Assistant only speaks Polish. The service is offered to a pilot group of customers.

GIFT CARDS
Netflix, Spotify, Xbox, Google Play, PlayStation, Nintendo and other platforms - you can top up your account or your friends’ account in IKO.

NEW KEYBOARD

Investments
Access to the offer of funds of PKO TFI and to the accounts in the Brokerage Office

Access to PPK and PPE
Access to the register of Employee Capital Plans (PPK) or Employee Pension Schemes (PPE) in PKO TFI

Voice assistant
Cost analysis and savings summary

IKO without an Account
Access to the IKO application without the need to open an account at PKO Bank Polski

Cash deposit machines on the map in IKO

title: IKO

creator: PKO Bank Polski SA
descriptionHtml:
Download the latest version of the free IKO application (electronic banking service) and use your bank account at PKO Bank Polski or Inteligo. The IKO app on your phone means fast and secure finances any day.

Activate the IKO app and take avail of the available functionalities:

BANK ACCOUNTS:
- account balance, history and details of all bank accounts,
- transfer to any domestic account number via Elixir or as an instant transfer,
- transfer based on data scanned from an invoice or from a QR code in an invoice,
- bank transfer by phone,
- bank transfer to Tax Office,
- foreign transfer,
- standing orders and a series of transfers,
- cash withdrawals from ATMs using the BLIK code,
- cash deposits (at selected ATMs) to your own or another IKO user’s bank account using the BLIK code,
- pre-paid phone top-ups,
- send a transfer request to another user,
- “piggy banks” to set money aside for any purpose,
- generate transfer confirmations,
- preview of unexecuted transactions (pending and canceled/rejected),
- applying for: a bank account (personal, savings and foreign currency*), an account overdraft*.

CARDS:
- history, details and images of your debit and credit cards,
- card management: activation, PIN assignment, change limits, temporary card freeze, restricting the card (with the option of getting a new one*), a change of card image,
- multi-currency card service*,
- transfer from a credit card,
- repay utilized credit card limit,
- credit card as a payments source for BLIK online & in-store payments.

LOANS:
- schedule and details of borrowings,
- apply for a loan*.

TERM DEPOSITS:
- details of term deposits,
- open and terminate term deposits.

INSURANCE:
- purchase travel and vehicle insurance*.

PAYMENTS:
- contactless payments by phone with NFC**,
- in store payments using the BLIK code/check,
- online payments with the BLIK code/check, also without copying the code in trusted online stores and browsers (Shopping without the BLIK code),
- create and share BLIK checks.

ADDITIONAL FUNCTIONALITIES:
- mobile authorization,
- public transport tickets,
- parking fee,
- "Join our cause": standing orders for charitable purposes,
- push notifications,
- localisation (also in the background),
- currency exchange*,
- 4 languages: Polish, English, Russian, Ukrainian,
- IKO personalization: change the main screen view and product names (accounts, deposits, loans),
- save and restore personalized application settings after re-installing IKO,
- option to simultaneously activate IKO and iPKO using the first login password,
- fingerprint login (Android 6.0 and a fingerprint reader required),
- shortcut button to favorite functions on the home screen,
- receive Western Union transfers,
- create and share QR codes with transfer details,
- currency exchange rates,
- map of PKO Bank Polski branches, ATMs and stores supporting BLIK payments.

For more on IKO go to iko.pkobp.pl/iko_en
For more on IKO activation go to iko.pkobp.pl/iko_en/activation

* Not available for Inteligo customers.
** Contactless payments are available for phones with NFC and minimum Android 4.4 to individual customers with a PKO Bank Polski, including Inteligo, debit or credit card. Contactless payments are not available on the so-called “rooted" devices, i.e. those on which manufacturer's security has been removed.

Activate the IKO app and take avail of the available functionalities:

BANK ACCOUNTS:
- account balance, history and details of all bank accounts,
- transfer to any domestic account number via Elixir or as an instant transfer,
- transfer based on data scanned from an invoice or from a QR code in an invoice,
- bank transfer by phone,
- bank transfer to Tax Office,
- foreign transfer,
- standing orders and a series of transfers,
- cash withdrawals from ATMs using the BLIK code,
- cash deposits (at selected ATMs) to your own or another IKO user’s bank account using the BLIK code,
- pre-paid phone top-ups,
- send a transfer request to another user,
- “piggy banks” to set money aside for any purpose,
- generate transfer confirmations,
- preview of unexecuted transactions (pending and canceled/rejected),
- applying for: a bank account (personal, savings and foreign currency*), an account overdraft*.

CARDS:
- history, details and images of your debit and credit cards,
- card management: activation, PIN assignment, change limits, temporary card freeze, restricting the card (with the option of getting a new one*), a change of card image,
- multi-currency card service*,
- transfer from a credit card,
- repay utilized credit card limit,
- credit card as a payments source for BLIK online & in-store payments.

LOANS:
- schedule and details of borrowings,
- apply for a loan*.

TERM DEPOSITS:
- details of term deposits,
- open and terminate term deposits.

INSURANCE:
- purchase travel and vehicle insurance*.

PAYMENTS:
- contactless payments by phone with NFC**,
- in store payments using the BLIK code/check,
- online payments with the BLIK code/check, also without copying the code in trusted online stores and browsers (Shopping without the BLIK code),
- create and share BLIK checks.

ADDITIONAL FUNCTIONALITIES:
- mobile authorization,
- public transport tickets,
- parking fee,
- "Join our cause": standing orders for charitable purposes,
- push notifications,
- localisation (also in the background),
- currency exchange*,
- 4 languages: Polish, English, Russian, Ukrainian,
- IKO personalization: change the main screen view and product names (accounts, deposits, loans),
- save and restore personalized application settings after re-installing IKO,
- option to simultaneously activate IKO and iPKO using the first login password,
- fingerprint login (Android 6.0 and a fingerprint reader required),
- shortcut button to favorite functions on the home screen,
- receive Western Union transfers,
- create and share QR codes with transfer details,
- currency exchange rates,
- map of PKO Bank Polski branches, ATMs and stores supporting BLIK payments.

For more on IKO go to iko.pkobp.pl/iko_en
For more on IKO activation go to iko.pkobp.pl/iko_en/activation

* Not available for Inteligo customers.
** Contactless payments are available for phones with NFC and minimum Android 4.4 to individual customers with a PKO Bank Polski, including Inteligo, debit or credit card. Contactless payments are not available on the so-called “rooted" devices, i.e. those on which manufacturer's security has been removed.
descriptionShort: Activate the IKO app and manage your personal finances on your phone

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Summing up of pending transactions
Presentation of a sum of transactions scheduled for processing.

Quicker access to products
New entry points to the application for a company account, a renewable limit and a consolidation loan.

Biometrics in IKO
Additional transactions in IKO which can be confirmed biometrically – public transport tickets, parking sites.

New look of "Insurance" section

Travel further!
We added the option of paying for new highway sections. Now, as part of the e-TOLL system, you can pay for the transit on the A2 Konin – Łódź and the A4 Wrocław – Gliwice route.

descriptionShort: Activate the IKO app and manage your personal finances on your phone

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
More opportunities for everybody
From now on, you can exchange currencies in our on-line currency exchange service in IKO without account, even if you have no account in PKO Bank Polski. You also have all your currency accounts at hand.

You can now see the instalments due
If you are repaying a motor insurance purchased in instalments, you will now see the entire schedule of instalments in IKO – with dates and amounts to be settled.

Bug fixes

- standing orders and a series of transfers,
- cash withdrawals from ATMs using the BLIK code,
- cash deposits (at selected ATMs) to your own or another IKO user’s bank account using the BLIK code,
- pre-paid phone top-ups,
- send a transfer request to another user,
- “piggy banks” to set money aside for any purpose,
- generate transfer confirmations,
- preview of unexecuted transactions (pending and canceled/rejected),
- applying for: a bank account (personal, savings and foreign currency*), an account overdraft*.

CARDS:
- history, details and images of your debit and credit cards,
- card management: activation, PIN assignment, change limits, temporary card freeze, restricting the card (with the option of getting a new one*), a change of card image,
- multi-currency card service*,
- transfer from a credit card,
- repay utilized credit card limit,
- credit card as a payments source for BLIK online & in-store payments.

LOANS:
- schedule and details of borrowings,
- apply for a loan*.

TERM DEPOSITS:
- details of term deposits,
- open and terminate term deposits.

INSURANCE:
- purchase travel and vehicle insurance*.

PAYMENTS:
- contactless payments by phone with NFC**,
- in store payments using the BLIK code/check,
- online payments with the BLIK code/check, also without copying the code in trusted online stores and browsers (Shopping without the BLIK code),
- create and share BLIK checks.

ADDITIONAL FUNCTIONALITIES:
- mobile authorization,
- public transport tickets,
- parking fee,
- "Join our cause": standing orders for charitable purposes,
- push notifications,
- localisation (also in the background),
- currency exchange*,
- 4 languages: Polish, English, Russian, Ukrainian,
- IKO personalization: change the main screen view and product names (accounts, deposits, loans),
- save and restore personalized application settings after re-installing IKO,
- option to simultaneously activate IKO and iPKO using the first login password,
- fingerprint login (Android 6.0 and a fingerprint reader required),
- shortcut button to favorite functions on the home screen,
- receive Western Union transfers,
- create and share QR codes with transfer details,
- currency exchange rates,
- map of PKO Bank Polski branches, ATMs and stores supporting BLIK payments.

For more on IKO go to iko.pkobp.pl/iko_en
For more on IKO activation go to iko.pkobp.pl/iko_en/activation

* Not available for Inteligo customers.
** Contactless payments are available for phones with NFC and minimum Android 4.4 to individual customers with a PKO Bank Polski, including Inteligo, debit or credit card. Contactless payments are not available on the so-called “rooted" devices, i.e. those on which manufacturer's security has been removed.
descriptionShort: Activate the IKO app and manage your personal finances on your phone

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
More opportunities for everybody
From now on, you can exchange currencies in our on-line currency exchange service in IKO without account, even if you have no account in PKO Bank Polski. You also have all your currency accounts at hand.

You can now see the instalments due
If you are repaying a motor insurance purchased in instalments, you will now see the entire schedule of instalments in IKO – with dates and amounts to be settled.

Bug fixes

descriptionShort: Activate the IKO app and manage your personal finances on your phone

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The voice assistant in IKO has acquired new skills
It has already been helping analyse expenses and savings and now it can also analyse payments with card from a vendor designated by you.

It is no longer necessary to re-write the BLIK code or the account number
Just copy it. In this version, the screen with the BLIK code and the account details next to the account number feature buttons that make it possible.

- transfer to any domestic account number via Elixir or as an instant transfer,
- transfer based on data scanned from an invoice or from a QR code in an invoice,
- bank transfer by phone,
- bank transfer to Tax Office,
- foreign transfer,
- standing orders and a series of transfers,
- cash withdrawals from ATMs using the BLIK code,
- cash deposits (at selected ATMs) to your own or another IKO user’s bank account using the BLIK code,
- pre-paid phone top-ups,
- send a transfer request to another user,
- “piggy banks” to set money aside for any purpose,
- generate transfer confirmations,
- preview of unexecuted transactions (pending and canceled/rejected),
- applying for: a bank account (personal, savings and foreign currency*), an account overdraft*.

CARDS:
- history, details and images of your debit and credit cards,
- card management: activation, PIN assignment, change limits, temporary card freeze, restricting the card (with the option of getting a new one*), a change of card image,
- multi-currency card service*,
- transfer from a credit card,
- repay utilized credit card limit,
- credit card as a payments source for BLIK online & in-store payments.

LOANS:
- schedule and details of borrowings,
- apply for a loan*.

TERM DEPOSITS:
- details of term deposits,
- open and terminate term deposits.

INSURANCE:
- purchase travel and vehicle insurance*.

PAYMENTS:
- contactless payments by phone with NFC**,
- in store payments using the BLIK code/check,
- online payments with the BLIK code/check, also without copying the code in trusted online stores and browsers (Shopping without the BLIK code),
- create and share BLIK checks.

ADDITIONAL FUNCTIONALITIES:
- mobile authorization,
- public transport tickets,
- parking fee,
- "Join our cause": standing orders for charitable purposes,
- push notifications,
- localisation (also in the background),
- currency exchange*,
- 4 languages: Polish, English, Russian, Ukrainian,
- IKO personalization: change the main screen view and product names (accounts, deposits, loans),
- save and restore personalized application settings after re-installing IKO,
- option to simultaneously activate IKO and iPKO using the first login password,
- fingerprint login (Android 6.0 and a fingerprint reader required),
- shortcut button to favorite functions on the home screen,
- receive Western Union transfers,
- create and share QR codes with transfer details,
- currency exchange rates,
- map of PKO Bank Polski branches, ATMs and stores supporting BLIK payments.

For more on IKO go to iko.pkobp.pl/iko_en
For more on IKO activation go to iko.pkobp.pl/iko_en/activation

* Not available for Inteligo customers.
** Contactless payments are available for phones with NFC and minimum Android 4.4 to individual customers with a PKO Bank Polski, including Inteligo, debit or credit card. Contactless payments are not available on the so-called “rooted" devices, i.e. those on which manufacturer's security has been removed.
descriptionShort: Activate the IKO app and manage your personal finances on your phone

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
See the difference
We have changed the appearance of the recipient list in transfers and improved the readability of screens in the application.

Find the transaction
Find the recipient, sender, title of the transfer or the store where the payment was made.

Do you have the PKO Dom insurance?
Check the details, change its coverage or contact the consultant.

descriptionShort: Activate the IKO app and manage your personal finances on your phone

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Don’t you have an account in our bank?
Still, you can take a loan. The money will be transferred to a selected account.
Do you have a child?
You can open a PKO Konto dla Dziecka and order the PKO Junior card – in one go.
Are you servicing your business in IKO?
Now, you will find separate profiles for individual and business products and recipients of transfers on one list.

descriptionShort: Activate the IKO app and manage your personal finances on your phone

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The ‘My Products’ tab is in the form of a list that makes access to favourite functions easier
In the ‘More’ tab you will see a new safety section that will remind you how to protect your finances
In Settings, you can update the identity document and the correspondence address
You can change the form of correspondence for the credit or investment products from paper to electronic one

- cash deposits (at selected ATMs) to your own or another IKO user’s bank account using the BLIK code,
- pre-paid phone top-ups,
- send a transfer request to another user,
- “piggy banks” to set money aside for any purpose,
- generate transfer confirmations,
- preview of unexecuted transactions (pending and canceled/rejected),
- applying for: a bank account (personal, savings and foreign currency*), an account overdraft*.

CARDS:
- history, details and images of your debit and credit cards,
- card management: activation, PIN assignment, change limits, temporary card freeze, restricting the card (with the option of getting a new one*), a change of card image,
- multi-currency card service*,
- transfer from a credit card,
- repay utilized credit card limit,
- credit card as a payments source for BLIK online & in-store payments.

LOANS:
- schedule and details of borrowings,
- apply for a loan*.

TERM DEPOSITS:
- details of term deposits,
- open and terminate term deposits.

INSURANCE:
- purchase travel and vehicle insurance*.

PAYMENTS:
- contactless payments by phone with NFC**,
- in store payments using the BLIK code/check,
- online payments with the BLIK code/check, also without copying the code in trusted online stores and browsers (Shopping without the BLIK code),
- create and share BLIK checks.

ADDITIONAL FUNCTIONALITIES:
- mobile authorization,
- public transport tickets,
- parking fee,
- "Join our cause": standing orders for charitable purposes,
- push notifications,
- localisation (also in the background),
- currency exchange*,

- IKO personalization: change the main screen view and product names (accounts, deposits, loans),

- fingerprint login (Android 6.0 and a fingerprint reader required),
- shortcut button to favorite functions on the home screen,
- receive Western Union transfers,
- create and share QR codes with transfer details,
- currency exchange rates,
- map of PKO Bank Polski branches, ATMs and stores supporting BLIK payments.

- cash deposits (at selected ATMs) to your own or another IKO user’s bank account using the BLIK code,
- pre-paid phone top-ups,
- send a transfer request to another user,
- “piggy banks” to set money aside for any purpose,
- generate transfer confirmations,
- preview of unexecuted transactions (pending and canceled/rejected),
- applying for: a bank account (personal, savings and foreign currency*), an account overdraft*.

CARDS:
- history, details and images of your debit and credit cards,
- card management: activation, PIN assignment, change limits, temporary card freeze, restricting the card (with the option of getting a new one*), a change of card image,
- multi-currency card service*,
- transfer from a credit card,
- repay utilized credit card limit,
- credit card as a payments source for BLIK online & in-store payments.

LOANS:
- schedule and details of borrowings,
- apply for a loan*.

TERM DEPOSITS:
- details of term deposits,
- open and terminate term deposits.

INSURANCE:
- purchase travel and vehicle insurance*.

- contactless payments by phone with NFC**,
- in store payments using the BLIK code/check,
- online payments with the BLIK code/check, also without copying the code in trusted online stores and browsers (Shopping without the BLIK code),
- create and share BLIK checks.

ADDITIONAL FUNCTIONALITIES:
- mobile authorization,
- public transport tickets,
- parking fee,
- "Join our cause": standing orders for charitable purposes,
- push notifications,
- localisation (also in the background),
- currency exchange*,

- IKO personalization: change the main screen view and product names (accounts, deposits, loans),

- fingerprint login (Android 6.0 and a fingerprint reader required),
- shortcut button to favorite functions on the home screen,
- receive Western Union transfers,
- create and share QR codes with transfer details,

- map of PKO Bank Polski branches, ATMs and stores supporting BLIK payments.

- account balance, history and details of all bank accounts,
- transfer to any domestic account number via Elixir or as an instant transfer,
- transfer based on data scanned from an invoice or from a QR code in an invoice,
- bank transfer by phone,
- bank transfer to Tax Office,
- foreign transfer,
- standing orders and a series of transfers,
- cash withdrawals from ATMs using the BLIK code,
- cash deposits (at selected ATMs) to your own or another IKO user’s bank account using the BLIK code,
- pre-paid phone top-ups,
- send a transfer request to another user,
- “piggy banks” to set money aside for any purpose,
- generate transfer confirmations,
- preview of unexecuted transactions (pending and canceled/rejected),
- applying for: a bank account (personal, savings and foreign currency*), an account overdraft*.

CARDS:
- history, details and images of your debit and credit cards,
- card management: activation, PIN assignment, change limits, temporary card freeze, restricting the card (with the option of getting a new one*), a change of card image,
- multi-currency card service*,
- transfer from a credit card,
- repay utilized credit card limit,
- credit card as a payments source for BLIK online & in-store payments.

LOANS:
- schedule and details of borrowings,
- apply for a loan*.

TERM DEPOSITS:
- details of term deposits,
- open and terminate term deposits.

INSURANCE:
- purchase travel and vehicle insurance*.

PAYMENTS:
- contactless payments by phone with NFC**,
- in store payments using the BLIK code/check,
- online payments with the BLIK code/check, also without copying the code in trusted online stores and browsers (Shopping without the BLIK code),
- create and share BLIK checks.

ADDITIONAL FUNCTIONALITIES:
- mobile authorization,
- public transport tickets,
- parking fee,
- "Join our cause": standing orders for charitable purposes,
- push notifications,
- localisation (also in the background),
- currency exchange*,
- 4 languages: Polish, English, Russian, Ukrainian,
- IKO personalization: change the main screen view and product names (accounts, deposits, loans),
- save and restore personalized application settings after re-installing IKO,
- option to simultaneously activate IKO and iPKO using the first login password,
- fingerprint login (Android 6.0 and a fingerprint reader required),
- shortcut button to favorite functions on the home screen,
- receive Western Union transfers,
- create and share QR codes with transfer details,
- currency exchange rates,
- map of PKO Bank Polski branches, ATMs and stores supporting BLIK payments.

For more on IKO go to iko.pkobp.pl/iko_en
For more on IKO activation go to iko.pkobp.pl/iko_en/activation

* Not available for Inteligo customers.
** Contactless payments are available for phones with NFC and minimum Android 4.4 to individual customers with a PKO Bank Polski, including Inteligo, debit or credit card. Contactless payments are not available on the so-called “rooted" devices, i.e. those on which manufacturer's security has been removed.

- card management: activation, PIN assignment, change limits, temporary card freeze, restricting the card (with the option of getting a new one*), a change of card image,
- multi-currency card service*,
- transfer from a credit card,
- repay utilized credit card limit,
- credit card as a payments source for BLIK online & in-store payments.

LOANS:
- schedule and details of borrowings,
- apply for a loan*.

TERM DEPOSITS:
- details of term deposits,
- open and terminate term deposits.

INSURANCE:
- purchase travel and vehicle insurance*.

PAYMENTS:
- contactless payments by phone with NFC**,
- in store payments using the BLIK code/check,
- online payments with the BLIK code/check, also without copying the code in trusted online stores and browsers (Shopping without the BLIK code),
- create and share BLIK checks.

ADDITIONAL FUNCTIONALITIES:
- mobile authorization,
- public transport tickets,
- parking fee,
- "Join our cause": standing orders for charitable purposes,
- push notifications,
- localisation (also in the background),
- currency exchange*,

- IKO personalization: change the main screen view and product names (accounts, deposits, loans),
- save and restore personalized application settings after re-installing IKO,
- option to simultaneously activate IKO and iPKO using the first login password,
- fingerprint login (Android 6.0 and a fingerprint reader required),
- shortcut button to favorite functions on the home screen,
- create and share QR codes with transfer details,
- currency exchange rates,
- map of PKO Bank Polski branches, ATMs and stores supporting BLIK payments.

For more on IKO activation go to iko.pkobp.pl/iko_en/activation

title:
IKO
3.160.24

creator: PKO Bank Polski SA
descriptionHtml:
Download the latest version of the free IKO application (electronic banking service) and use your bank account at PKO Bank Polski or Inteligo. The IKO app on your phone means fast and secure finances any day.

Activate the IKO app and take avail of the available functionalities:

BANK ACCOUNTS:
- account balance, history and details of all bank accounts,
- transfer to any domestic account number via Elixir or as an instant transfer,
- transfer based on data scanned from an invoice or from a QR code in an invoice,
- bank transfer by phone,
- bank transfer to Tax Office,
- foreign transfer,
- standing orders and a series of transfers,
- cash withdrawals from ATMs using the BLIK code,
- cash deposits (at selected ATMs) to your own or another IKO user’s bank account using the BLIK code,
- pre-paid phone top-ups,
- send a transfer request to another user,
- “piggy banks” to set money aside for any purpose,
- generate transfer confirmations,
- preview of unexecuted transactions (pending and canceled/rejected),
- applying for: a bank account (personal, savings and foreign currency*), an account overdraft*.

CARDS:
- history, details and images of your debit and credit cards,
- card management: activation, PIN assignment, change limits, temporary card freeze, restricting the card (with the option of getting a new one*), a change of card image,
- multi-currency card service*,
- transfer from a credit card,
- repay utilized credit card limit,
- credit card as a payments source for BLIK online & in-store payments.

LOANS:
- schedule and details of borrowings,
- apply for a loan*.

TERM DEPOSITS:
- details of term deposits,
- open and terminate term deposits.

INSURANCE:
- purchase travel and vehicle insurance*.

PAYMENTS:
- contactless payments by phone with NFC**,
- in store payments using the BLIK code/check,
- online payments with the BLIK code/check, also without copying the code in trusted online stores and browsers (Shopping without the BLIK code),
- create and share BLIK checks.

ADDITIONAL FUNCTIONALITIES:
- mobile authorization,
- public transport tickets,
- parking fee,
- "Join our cause": standing orders for charitable purposes,
- push notifications,
- localisation (also in the background),
- currency exchange*,
- 4 languages: Polish, English, Russian, Ukrainian,
- IKO personalization: change the main screen view and product names (accounts, deposits, loans),
- save and restore personalized application settings after re-installing IKO,
- option to simultaneously activate IKO and iPKO using the first login password,
- fingerprint login (Android 6.0 and a fingerprint reader required),
- shortcut button to favorite functions on the home screen,
- create and share QR codes with transfer details,
- currency exchange rates,
- map of PKO Bank Polski branches, ATMs and stores supporting BLIK payments.

For more on IKO go to iko.pkobp.pl/iko_en
For more on IKO activation go to iko.pkobp.pl/iko_en/activation

* Not available for Inteligo customers.
** Contactless payments are available for phones with NFC and minimum Android 4.4 to individual customers with a PKO Bank Polski, including Inteligo, debit or credit card. Contactless payments are not available on the so-called “rooted" devices, i.e. those on which manufacturer's security has been removed.
